message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would significantly benefit you. Given its intrinsic value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This represents a substantial savings compared to the market value, making it an excellent investment for you. I trust that you will find the product invaluable and worth every penny. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details about the product.
